name: Geometry Marathon
description:
Geometry Marathon is a mobile game for android devices. You are tasked with navigating ten tense levels of increasingly difficult runs where one false mood can result in failure. Your reaction time will be put to the test as an increasing amount of obstacles will be joined by false barriers and switches requiring you to have a keen eye.

Don't forget to grab as many coins as possible if you want three stars at the end of a level! 

---

Features include:

  • Simple controls, just tap each side of the screen to move your avatar.
  • Ten levels with new mechanics and increasingly difficult layouts as you progress.
  • An endless mode, how high can your score get?
  • Switches can alter the obstacles you face.
  • Keep an eye out for false obstacles, new passages may be open to you!

---

This is a non-commercial project created for the  Mobile Technology in Computer Games course (2019 MOD007027 TRI2 F01CAM) as part of the Computer Gaming Technology BSc (Hons) course at Anglia Ruskin University.
